title: Katy Perry posts red swimsuit photo on Instagram for 35th birthday
text:
Katy Perry turned 35-years-old on Friday.

And to say happy birthday to herself, the Grammy winning siren posted a photo to her 86M Instagram followers where she was in a low-cut red swimsuit with a floral design.

The Santa Barbara, California native appeared to be in Hawaii where she filmed her recent Harleys In Hawaii music video.

Pinup girl: Katy Perry turned 35-years-old on Friday. And to say happy birthday to herself, the Grammy winning siren posted a photo to her 86M Instagram followers where she was in a low-cut red swimsuit with a floral design

The star wore her hair down in beach waves and added gold hoop earrings.

And the I Kissed A Girl star also added a white flower behind one of her ears as she placed an arm on her head.

The beauty has a lot to be grateful for.

Her music career has been going great as she has released new singles. And she is planning her wedding to fiance Orlando Bloom.

But last year Katy faced tragedy as her longtime friend, music producer Angelica Cob-Baehler, passed away.

She's still got it: The star wore her hair down in beach waves and added gold hoop earrings. And the I Kissed A Girl star also added a white flower behind one of her ears as she placed an arm on her head

Deja vu: The crooner wore the exact same suit when she filmed her music video for Harleys In Hawaii

Love: Katy wrapped her arms around the mystery biker guy who had her eye

At the time, Katy shared a moving tribute to her pal, a successful music manager.

The note read in part: 'She was one of the strongest women I have ever known - fighting her cancer like friggin’ Rocky, enduring chemo, immunotherapy, a tracheotomy, feeding tubes for months on end, and experimental cancer treatment trials.

'I watched her go through many stages for over a year, but a few things remained constant: her sarcastic/wicked sense of humor, her positive outlook, and the incredible love she had for her family. We had a lot of wins together for over 10 years.'

She is in love: The beauty has a lot to be grateful for. Her music career has been going great as she has released new singles. And she is planning her wedding to fiance Orlando Bloom, pictured in Hollywood in August

Never forget Geli Donut! Perry was rocked last year by the death of her longtime friend Angelica Cob-Baehler, who was the music executive that put Katy on the map

A song dedicated to Angelica will likely appear on Katy's next album.

Perry's latest songs, Harleys In Hawaii, is one of her most relaxed. But the music video is full of passion.

The singer is seen hopping on a motorcycle and getting steamy with her lover in Hawaii.

This is her third single off of her rumored forthcoming album following her previous songs Never Really Over and Small Talk.

New music! Katy's music video and song for Harleys In Hawaii was released this month

In Hawaii: The music video was filmed in Hawaii and tells the story of Katy falling in love and enjoying her time with her love while on the island

The video starts off with the 34-year-old on a motorcycle riding through the streets of the island wearing a black leather jacket full of patches that say things like 'ride or die' while sporting a burnt orange helmet with a yellow star on the side.

She then stops at a bar where a man catches her eye as she sips on a breezy island drink before grabbing the microphone and singing along to the music.

That's when the love affair begins and the scene switches to the two getting close on the beach and making out in the water.

The look: She wore a black leather jacket full of patches that say things like 'ride or die' while sporting a burnt orange helmet with a yellow star on the side

Get into the groove: The I Kissed A Girl hitmaker closes her eyes as she sings along

Falling in love: After the two meet in the bar they are seen getting close in the water

So much intimacy: In many scenes she is kissing the beared fellow

Throughout the video we see the two grow closer together and share intimate moments at various parts of their little getaway.

At one point the two are cuddling in bed while the This Is How We Do singer wears a white blouse and blue underwear.

And towards the end, Katy hops on the back of the motorcycle cycle with her new beau and even gets a little risky as she lets go and puts her hands out while riding on the back while her lover drives.

Back in July, she opened up while on a radio show about the inspiration behind the track and how it came from her vacation with none other than her fiancé Orlando Bloom when they were in Oahu.

'We were in Hawaii [shooting American Idol] and we went and rented a Harley,' she told the Zach Sang Show.

'To be on the back of a motorcycle in Hawaii with the air blowing on your face is so beautiful. It was awesome. I can remember specifically where I was, the street corner I was on in Oahu, turning that corner and whispering to Orlando: 'I'm going to write a song called Harleys in Hawaii, and I did. It just dropped into my head.'
description: Katy Perry turned 35-years-old on Friday. And to say happy birthday to herself, the Grammy winning siren posted a photo to her 86M Instagram followers.
